casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy Lee FARMER 8A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 20, 2019 Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, Attorney at Law, for Farmer, Jimmy Lee. Anna M. Szamosi, Assistant Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of May 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of May 2019."

WITNESS my hand and the seal of the Supreme Court of North Carolina, this the 20th day of May 2019.
